tool_description: validate international bank account identifiers, find country, related bank institution details and possible BIC/SWIFT codes
name: IBAN Processor and Validator
title: IBAN Processor and Validator

api_list.name: Input
api_list.description:
## Input
**IBAN**: an international bank account identifier containing the country prefix with or without spaces

## Response
An array with **Success** or **Failure** as Keys and values the achieved processing level, on success a **Data** array key containing processing results and also on success, a **Request** array key, containing input passed to the API, as well as processing information. On failure an **Errors** array key will have value a short description of the processing or validation error scope.
